content:
I'm thrilled to hear that! A weekday afternoon event is a great way to break up the workweek and give your team a much-needed break. It's wonderful that you're recognizing your team's hard work and accomplishments, and celebrating your own milestone as Senior Marketing Manager.

It's amazing how far you've come since February 15th, and this event will be a fantastic way to reflect on your achievements and look forward to future successes together as a team. I'm sure your team will appreciate the opportunity to unwind, have fun, and bond over a shared experience.

Now that you have a better idea of the event details, I recommend reaching out to the escape room or scavenger hunt organizers I mentioned earlier to inquire about availability, pricing, and customization options. Be sure to ask about any specific requirements, such as catering, audio-visual equipment, or accessibility needs.

Remember to also consider the logistics, such as transportation, parking, and accessibility, to ensure that everyone can participate comfortably.

Lastly, don't forget to communicate the event details clearly with your team, including the date, time, location, and dress code (if applicable). You might also want to create a fun, engaging invitation to get everyone excited about the event!

How do you plan to promote the event to your team, and what kind of tone do you want to set for the celebration?
